entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
